content: **crocheted place mat in drops belle or drops muskat theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no vs-068 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** approx 37 cm in diameter **materials** drops belle from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100 g colour 03 light beige or use drops muskat from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100 g colour 09 nutmeg 1 mat in belle weighs approx 70 g and in muskat approx 88 g **crochet gauge** 20 treble crochets in width and 10 row in height = 10 x 10 cm crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
